import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Banner' const Nav = () => { let Links = [ { name: "Новости", link: "/" }, { name: "О карте", link: "/" }, { name: "Партнеры", link: "/" }, { name: "Форма заявки", link: "/" }, { name: "CONTACT", link: "/" }, ]; let [open, setOpen] = useState(false); return (
Designer
setOpen(!open)} className='text-3xl absolute right-8 top-6 cursor-pointer md:hidden'>
    { Links.map((link) => (
  • {link.name}
    • )) }
) } export default Nav
